channel.title: Cannot log out/tele?
channel.description:
[b]Hey i'd like to know how to:[/b]
[b]1:[/b][i]Make an area where you cannot log out.[/i] [b]2:[/b][i]Make an area where you cannot teleport.[ teleblocked ][/i]

item.title: Cannot log out/tele?
item.dc:creator: @lunden lunden
item.description:
@lunden wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:4, topic:230391”]That’s a code for a jail so that nobody can teleport out…
So don’t tell him to GTFO if you cannot understand his SIMPLE coding.

Make a command that says something like:

}
if command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
(COORDS)
(COORDS)
p.action = 1;
p.sendMessage("You have been jailed by " + playerName);
sendMessage(“You have jailed “+p.playerName+”.”);
} else {
sendMessage(“That name doesn’t exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter a name you want to jail!”);
}

That was just a simple command off the top of my head, might not work.[/quote]
Dude, wtf that doesnt help me.
Nothing of that help’s me make an area,
where you cannot log out or teleport…

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot log out/tele?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

That’s a code for a jail so that nobody can teleport out…
So don’t tell him to GTFO if you cannot understand his SIMPLE coding.

Make a command that says something like:

}
if command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
(COORDS)
(COORDS)
p.action = 1;
p.sendMessage("You have been jailed by " + playerName);
sendMessage(“You have jailed “+p.playerName+”.”);
} else {
sendMessage(“That name doesn’t exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter a name you want to jail!”);
}

That was just a simple command off the top of my head, might not work.

item.title: Cannot log out/tele?
item.dc:creator: @lunden lunden
item.description:
@lunden wrote:

[quote=“Randomking17, post:2, topic:230391”]Have a perfect Dodain Jail!

public boolean isInJail() { if((absX >= 2928 && absX <= 2943 && absY >= 3275 && absY <=3291)) return true; else return false; } public boolean isInJail2() { if((absX >= 2926 && absX <= 2938 && absY >= 3274 && absY <=3292)) return true; else return false; }

if(!isInJail() && action == 1){ toX = 2933; toY = 3285; }

If you’re good at coding, You’ll know where they go.
If you don’t code on Dodain…
Rofl nub.[/quote]
wutthefuck, whats this :s
and u call me nub`? gtfo pls

Read full topic
